name: Lust Theory Season 2
description:
Season 2 of your favorite game is here!

Once again, you get to live with three beautiful women. But just when you thought it couldn't get weirder, Friday comes.
Are you ready to experience a day full of thrilling passion, unexpected revelations, excitement, and not to mention the party everyone's been talking about... Yes? That's great! Although, would you do it again? And again? And again...

Try to live with the consequences from the previus day, Unlock secret EVENTS, find out why the day is repeating, and much, much more all in Season 2!


Not only do you get to proceed with the storyline of your favorite characters, but we covered all the popular fetishes to tend to your personal needs.

Boobjob, assjob, footjob, anal? Don't worry, we got it.


A new hot bombshell enters the game. Or should we say, bombshells?

For those who weren't satisfied with the number of gorgeous women surrounding you, we added fresh new faces.

Get back in touch with your childhood friend and save her from the obsessed stalker.

Another MILF!? Yes, please.


"What would happen if you..."

Season 2 holds multiple "Secret Events" spread across different festivities and activities.

Play out your wildest fantasies with your favorite characters and meet some new ones along the way.


Our dear players, it's time.

In season 2, you will FINALLY find out the reason behind the day repeating itself!

Had your suspicions already? Well, find out if your theory was right on the mark.

Hah, "theory". See what we did there? 😉


Content:

  • 44.500+ IMAGES
  • 1000+ ANIMATIONS

Gameplay:

  • FULL VOICE-OVER (for all female characters)
  • Free Roam
  • Time Cycle
  • In-game Hint System
  • Define Your Own Relationships
  • Re-live HOT Scenes
  • "Lust Time" (interactive sex scenes)
  • Change Angles on Images
  • Slut angle
  • Nude Mode
  • Steam Achievements
  • And much more...

Please note: This release features a partial voice over. The full voice over version will be available in a few months alongside translations into Spanish, Chinese, Russian and more...

WARNING!

This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
